SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: WO_about_to_breach_the_SLA
SQLDataSource.Where: wo_no IN (SELECT wo_no FROM (SELECT a.wo_no, &AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_Id(a.task_seq) as contract_id, &AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_Reg_Date(a.wo_no) as reg_date, &AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Customer_No(a.task_seq)) representative_id FROM &AO.jt_task_cfv a WHERE a.state IN ('New', 'Under Preparation', 'Prepared', 'Released', 'Work Started') AND (a.cf$_tunstall_sla > sysdate AND a.cf$_tunstall_sla <= sysdate + 1)) WHERE REPLACE(NVL(contract_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%') AND reg_date >= TO_DATE(NVL('$BEGIN_DATE$', '01/01/1900'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND reg_date <= TO_DATE(NVL('$END_DATE$', '31/12/2999') || ' 11:59:59 PM', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss pm') AND REPLACE(NVL(representative_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%'))
